name: Operation Winston
description:
The crazed Professor Winston plans to conquer Earth, but when aliens from a distant planet threaten to beat him to it, Winston travels to their world to stop them.

Winston:

Arrow KeysMovement and Menu NavigationZJump and ConfirmXFire and CancelIn Air + XDouble Jump
ENTERPause and Skip Dialogue

* WASD Controls available in settings

Droney (2P):

Numpad ArrowsMovementNumpad 9 HoldGrabNumpad 9 ReleaseRelease
